The correct answer is C: Event 6: Pouring the reaction mixture through the funnel so that the solid copper is trapped on the filter paper while the blue filtrate passes through.

The narrator mentions filtering all the water out of the mixture and leaving only copper in the filter paper. This indicates that the filtration process was successful, which aligns with Event 6 where the reaction mixture was poured through the funnel, trapping the solid copper on the filter paper. The other events mentioned do not directly relate to the filtration process.
